nodes.text: The Ore Processing Center was a type of building used for breaking down and smelting raw minerals into usable metals, usually durasteel. Generally found at mining outposts, mining droids or other miners extracting ore from ore deposits would bring carts of the precious raw metals back to these structures.
Ore Processing Centers serve as resource drop-off buildings in the 2001 video game Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds and its 2002 expansion pack.
